original_text: So David and all the house of Israel brought up the ark of the Lord with shouting and with the sound of the horn.
korean_text: 다윗과 온 이스라엘 족속이 즐거이 환호하며 나팔을 불고 여호와의 궤를 메어오니라

sentences.original_text: So David and all the house of Israel
brought up the ark of the Lord
and with the sound of the horn.
